name: The unSpoken: Glyphs of the Ancient Souls
name_original: The unSpoken: Glyphs of the Ancient Souls
description:
The unSpoken: Glyphs of the Ancient Souls is a RPG game developed by Arkana Intermedia Studios. It was originally released in 2004. Arkana Intermedia Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
The unSpoken: Glyphs of the Ancient Souls is available on PC.
